mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (memberId, memberPassword, memberName, memberNickname, memberPhone, membershipAgreementYn, optionalInfoAgreementYn) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberPhone}, #{membershipAgreementYn}, #{optionalInfoAgreementYn})
mapper.select: SELECT id, memberId, memberPassword, memberName, memberNickname, memberPhone, membershipAgreementYn, optionalInfoAgreementYn, createdAt, updatedAt FROM member WHERE memberId = #{memberId}
